message: @micrypt ok, i see a Makefile in SDL setting up GCC flags. thanks again :)
thanks for the link! one more thing, cgo docs tell about the #cgo directive for passing options to gcc, but it didn't work for me...
have you tried using c libraries from your go code? i'm just reading docs on the cgo tool and looking for some examples on the net
